title: Upsell - Hardware Upgrade
description: An existing customer is eligible for a phone upgrade. The agent's goal is to sell them a new device.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and confirm their upgrade eligibility.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer can upgrade their device.

tasks.description: Present the latest flagship phone models with their financing options.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly presents the features and costs of new phones.

tasks.description: Process the order for the new phone selected by the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully completes the sale and arranges for shipping.
